customer_reviews.title: Clumpy, waxy, difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: Totally hate this product. Very waxy/hard and difficult to apply. And when I looked at my lips after an hour, the product was clumped up in areas on my lips. Gross and awful. The only thing positive I can say about this product is that the vanilla scent is pleasant.
